#labels installation,setup,configuration
= Configuring jsVNC with MIFCHO =

jsVNC utilizes MIFCHO as a translator of websockets/hobs to regular RAW sockets.

== Download and install MIFCHO ==

{{{
mkdir jsenv
cd jsenv
wget "http://mifcho.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/dist/mifcho-0.1.tar.gz"
tar xzf mifcho-0.1.tar.gz
cd mifcho-0.1/
sudo python setup.py install
cd ..
}}}

== Download jsVNC ==

{{{
svn export http://jsvnc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/ jsvnc
}}}

== Configure MIFCHO ==

Create the configurationfile 'mifcho.conf':

{{{
[General]

bind=
  tcp://0.0.0.0:8000

orchestration =
  8000 http /hobs HobsHandler
  8000 http /wsocket WebsocketHandler
  8000 http /jsvnc StaticWebHandler

[StaticWebHandler]
workers = 2
path_prefix=/full/path/to/jsvnc/sourcecode/
}}}

== Run It ==

{{{
./mifcho -c mifcho.conf -l mifcho.log
}}}

Navigate your browser: http://your_hostname:8000/jsvnc/vnc.html
